==Trivia==
* {{W|Eugène-François Vidocq}} was a French criminal turned {{W|Forensic science|criminalist}}, whose life story inspired several writers, including {{W|Victor Hugo}}, {{W|Edgar Allan Poe}}, and {{W|Honoré de Balzac}}.
*He shares his English voice actor Caleb Yen with [[Gaming]].
